message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product! I'm looking to get $200 for it.  Let me know what you think!
Hey Alice, $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $150. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $175. Let's see if we can make a deal!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $175 is still a little high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $150.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
